p: When the THA moiety ( 35) was in the place of the phthalimide one, the R=H compounds showed a higher nanomolar activity against AChE and, to the same extent, on BuChE, becoming nonselective and noncompetitive ChE inhibitors, but still deserving further development for AD treatment. The antagonist activity on 5-HT 6R was also conserved, and the 5-C atom chain gave the best Ki value of 72 nM. The thioflavin-T (ThT) assay on A β self-aggregation revealed equal or better inhibitory potency (over 92%) than resveratrol used as a reference, and PAMPA-BBB prediction determined a favorable potential to diffuse across the membranes.
